bibl.title: The Ostrakon Revaliense: A Revised Text. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: New edition of the "ostrakon Revaliense" (= S.B. IV, 7274), once located in the Provincial Museum of Reval (= Tallinn), now in the Estonian History Museum. Tax receipt for a payment made for cheironaxion due by weavers of the temples of Elephantine, 19.x.111 CE.
bibl.seg: 145.4 O. Tallinn Estonian History Mus. Inv. TAAM-9494 K 538
WORP Klaas A., The Ostrakon Revaliense: A Revised Text. Avec résumé en anglais.
Studia Humaniora Tartuensia 11 (2010) A.2, 3 pp. et 1 pl. coul. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < https://ojs.utlib.ee/index.php/sht/article/view/11.A.2/worp1 >.]

New edition of the "ostrakon Revaliense" (= S.B. IV, 7274), once located in the Provincial Museum of Reval (= Tallinn), now in the Estonian History Museum. Tax receipt for a payment made for cheironaxion due by weavers of the temples of Elephantine, 19.x.111 CE.
